articles.title: Freedom Under Law raises concerns over composition of selection panel for new Chief Justice - News24
articles.description: Freedom Under Law (FUL) says while it notes President Cyril Ramaphosa's decision to invite public participation in selecting South Africa's next Chief Justice, it has several concerns relating to the composition of the panel appointed to shortlist nominees.
articles.content:
• Chief Justice Mogoeng Mogoeng's term will come to an end on 11 October. 
  • President Cyril Ramaphosa has called on the public to nominate South Africa's next Chief Justice to promote tr… [+2658 chars]

articles.description: South Africa should consider vaccinating adolescents against the coronavirus after data showed that the most common underlying cause of death among youngsters who contracted Covid-19 during the ongoing third wave was HIV infection, the National Institute for …

articles.title: A steward asked Cristiano Ronaldo if she had died after being hit by the soccer star's wayward shot - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: The woman was reassured by the Portuguese forward that she was still alive and was given his shirt as a way to say sorry.
articles.content:
A woman who was hit by a wayward Cristiano Ronaldo shot asked the Portuguese forward if she had died.

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Africa COVID jab shortfall could take world 'back to square one': WHO - Eyewitness News
articles.description: Only 17% of the continent's population will now be vaccinated by the end of this year, compared with the 40% target set by the World Health Organization, the global agency's Africa unit said at its weekly briefing in the Congolese capita of Brazzaville.
